     Deck<Weapon> weaponsDeck)
        Creates a new game
        Parameters:
        skullsNum - Number of skulls to use in the killshot track
        gameMap - Map to be used in the match
        powersDeck - POWER cards deck
        ammoDeck - Loot cards deck
        weaponsDeck - Weapon cards deck

      • addPlayer

        public boolean addPlayer(Player pl)
                  throws UsedNameException
        Add a player to the game
        Parameters:
        pl - Added player
        Returns:
        If false there are too many players already or there is already a player with the same name
        Throws:
        UsedNameException - When the new player has the same nickname as another one already in the game, but is not the same player

      • initializeSkullsBoard

        public boolean initializeSkullsBoard(int skullsNum)
        Initialize the skulls board when the first player choose the number of skulls of the match
        Parameters:
        skullsNum - number of the skulls chosen for the match (between 5 and 8)
        Returns:
        true if the number of skulls was compatible with the specification
